name: Helmet LCD Game
description:
Our hero, a construction worker, is in trouble. Tools are falling from the sky and nowhere is safe. The aim of the game is to enter the hut on the right when its door is open. Press 'game A' or 'game B' to start playing. Use Left or Right button on the screen to move. This is a remake of an LCD game from the 80's.

The game features:
• Retro gameplay true to the original LCD game from the 80's.
• Easy to learn.
• Hard to master.
• Hi-score and bonuses.
